newsitem.title: SPAIN: SOCCER-ALFONSO BOOSTS BETIS TO SECOND SPOT.
newsitem.headline: SOCCER-ALFONSO BOOSTS BETIS TO SECOND SPOT.

text.p: Real Betis stormed into second place in the Spanish championship on Sunday thanks to a second successive league hat-trick by striker Alfonso Perez in the 4-0 win at Rayo Vallecano.
Betis jumped three points above Barcelona, who were set to play Logrones later, and within six of Real Madrid, off duty until Monday.

Fourth-placed Deportivo Coruna moved level with Barcelona after Saturday's 1-0 win at Espanyol, but Atletico Madrid appeared to have lost all chance of retaining their title after crashing 4-1 at home to Valencia.
